text: Ani apalya sinhasanavara apalya mata-pityasa uccasthani basavile ani sarva tyacyasamora sajadyata padale1 ani sarva mhanale, he pita! Ha majhya pahilya svapnaca khulasa ahe, majhya palanakartyane to purna karuna dakhavila. Tyane majhyavara phara motha upakara kela, ki jevha mala kaidakhan'yatuna bahera kadhale ani tumhi lokanna valavantatuna yethe anale tya matabhedanantara, jo saitanane majhya ani majhya bhavancya daramyana nirmana kela hota. Majha palanakarta, jyacyasathi icchito, tyacyasathi uttama upayayojana karato. Nihsansaya to motha jananara, hikamata balaganara ahe
